#**Introduction**
For this project, we will be using three different data sets.
The first dataset is "OIS_Dataset_Incidents.csv". 
The second dataset is "OIS_Dataset_Officers".
The third dataset is "OIS_Dataset_Subjects.csv".

To download the data needed for this project:

1. Click or copy/paste this link to your web browser https://data.world/ryanmak/s-17-dv-final-project
2. Download the files "OIS_Dataset_Incidents.csv", "OIS_Dataset_Officers", and "OIS_Dataset_Subjects.csv".


#**R Configuration**
Below we display our sessionInfo(). 

```{r}
sessionInfo(package=NULL)
```

Here we have the ETL code to clean our datasets.
